LanguageData.FOU.NaniteAbility.TargetThingIsUnrepaira: Cannot use {ABILITY_label} on unrepairable items or buildings.
LanguageData.FOU.NaniteAbility.TargetThingDoNotNeedRe: Cannot use {ABILITY_label} on items or buildings requiring no repair.
LanguageData.FOU.NaniteAbility.ActivateRecoveryProgra: Activate higher-dimensional nanites within the subject's body, triggering instantaneous consciousness reintegration and rapid cellular regeneration within seconds.\n\nExcess energy can be utilized to teleport the host to a secured location while vital signs remain stable.
Nanites within the subject's body have been activated.
